Translations.Text: Ha yi, mi mu.
Zhe shi cong zhiren zhi ci de zhu jiangxia de qishi.
Zhe shi yi bu jie wen xiangming de tian jing, shi wei you zhishi de minzhong er jiang shi de alabo wen de (“gulanjing”),
keyi zuo baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe; dan tamen daban tuibi er bu ken tingcong.

Tamen shuo:`Women de xin zai mengbi zhong, buneng liaojie ni dui women de jiaodao, women de erduo you zhong ting; zai women he ni zhi jian you yidao pingzhang. Ni gan ni de ba, women biding yao gan women de!'

Ni shuo:`Wo gen nimen yiyang, zhishi yige fanren, wo feng dao qishi:`Nimen suo yingdang chongbai de, zhishi du yi de zhuzai. Suoyi nimen yingdang zun zhenglu er quxiang ta, yingdang xiang ta qiurao.'Shang zai yi wu pei zhu zhe!
Tamen buna tian ke, buxin houshi.
Xindao erqie xingshan zhe bi shou buduan de baochou.
Ni shuo:`Nimen zhen buxin zai liang rinei chuangzao dadi zhe, er yao wei ta shuli xuduo pidi ma? Na shi quan shijie de zhu.'
Ta zai dadishang chuangzao xuduo shanyue, ta jiang fu yu da di, bing yuding da dishang zhongsheng de shiwu. Naxie shi, zai zhengzheng de si tian jiu wanchengle. Na shi yong lai dafu xunwen zhe de.
Ranhou, ta zhiyu zao tian, na shi, tian haishi zhengqi. Ta dui tiandi shuo:`Nimen lia shunfu de, huo mianqiang de lai ba!'Ta lia shuo:`Women lia shunfu de laile.'
Ta zai liang rinei chuangzaole qi ceng tian, ta yi ta de mingling qishi ge tian de jumin, ta yi zhong xing dianzhui zuidi de tian, bing jiayi baohu. Na shi wanneng de, quanzhi de zhu de yuding.
Ruguo tamen tuibi, ni jiu shuo:`Wo jinggao nimen yizhong xingfa, ta xiang a de ren he sai mo de ren suo shou de xingfa yiyang.'

Dangshi, zhong shizhe cong tamen de qianhou lailin tamen, shuo:`Chu zhenzhu wai, nimen buyao chongbai renhe wu.'Tamen shuo:`Jiaruo women de zhu yiyu, ta bi jiangxia xuduo tianshen, women biding buxin nimen suo feng de shiming.'

Zhiyu a de ren, tamen bu gai zai difang shang wangzizunda, tamen shuo:`Shui bi women nengli geng qiangda ne?'Nandao tamen bu zhidao chuangzao tamen de zhenzhu bi tamen geng qiangda ma? Tamen fourenle wo de xuduo jixiang,
wo shi baofeng zai ruogan xiong ri li shanghai tamen, shi tamen zai jinshi shenghuo zhong changshi lingru de xingfa, er houshi de xingfa, que shi geng lingru de, tamen jiang bu huo yuanzhu.
Zhi yu sai mo de ren, ze wo ceng yindao tamen, dan tamen she zhengdao er qu mi wu, gu lingru de xingfa de pili yin tamen de xingwei er hongjile tamen.
Wo ceng zhengjiule xindao er jingwei zhe.
Zai na ri, zhenzhu de diren jiang bei zhaoji dao huo yu qu. Tamen shi shou yueshu de.
Dai tamen lai dao huo yu de shihou, tamen de ermu pifu jiang zuo zheng tamen de xingwei.

Tamen jiang dui ziji de pifu shuo:`Nimen weishenme zuo buli yu women de jianzheng ne?'Tamen jiang shuo:`Neng shi wanwu shuohua de zhenzhu, yi shi women shuohuale. Ta chuci chuangzao nimen, nimen zhi bei zhao guiyu ta.'
Guoqu, nimen meiyou fangbei nimen de ermu pifu hui zuo buli yu nimen de jianzheng, dan nimen caixiang zhenzhu bu zhidao nimen suozuo de xuduo shiqing.
Nimen duiyu nimen de zhu suo huai de zhe zhong caixiang yi haile nimen, gu nimen bianchengle kui she zhe.
Ruguo tamen neng renshou, namo, huo yu jiushi tamen de zhuchu; ruguo tamen yao en, yuanliang, namo, tamen jue bude yao en.

Wo yi wei tamen yuding xuduo mo ban, er naxie mo ban, yi tamen shengqian huo sihou de shiqing mihuo tamen, tamen yingdang shou xingfa de panjue, er ru yu yiqian shiqu de jingling he renlei de ruogan minzu zhi zhong, er yuyan dui tamen shixian, tamen que shi kui she zhe.
Bu xindao zhe shuo:`Nimen buyao ting zhe “gulanjing”, nimen yingdang raoluan song jing de shengyin, huoxu nimen jiang huode shengli.'
Wo bi shi bu xindao zhe changshi yanli de xingfa, wo bi yi zui lie de baochou baoda tamen de zui'e.
Na jiushi zhenzhu de diren suo shou de baochou——huo yu, tamen zai huo yuzhong you yongjiu de zhuzhai, na shi yinwei baochou tamen fouren wo de jixiang.
Bu xindao zhe shuo:`Women de zhu a! Qiu ni zhaoshi women naxie ceng shi women mi wu de jingling he renlei, rang women jiang tamen ta zai women de jiaoxia, yibian tamen biancheng zui xiajian de.'

Fan shuoguo `women de zhu shi zhenzhu', ranhou zunxun zhengdao zhe, zhong tianshen jiang lailin tamen, shuo:`Nimen buyao kongju, buyao youchou, nimen yingdang wei nimen bei yu xu de leyuan er gaoxing.
Zai jinshi he houshi, women dou shi nimen de baohu zhe. Nimen zai leyuan li jiang xiangshou nimen suo aihao de yiqie, nimen zai leyuan li jiang xiangshou nimen suo yaoqiu de yiqie.
Na shi zhiren zhi ci de zhu suo ci de yan xiang.'
Zhao ren xinyang zhenzhu, li xingshan gong, bingqie shuo:`Wo que shi musilin'de ren, zai yanci fangmian, you shui bi ta geng youmei ne?
Shan e bushi yiyang de. Ni yingdang yi zui youmei de pinxing qu duifu elie de pinxing, namo, yu ni xiang chou zhe, huran jian hui bian de qin ru miyou.
Wei jianren zhe, huo ci meide, wei you dafu fen zhe, huo ci meide.
Ruguo emo songyong ni, ni yingdang qiu bi yu zhenzhu. Ta que shi quan cong de, que shi quanzhi de.
Zhouye yu ri yue, dou shi ta de jixiang. Nimen buyao xiang ri yue koutou, nimen yingdang xiang chuangzao naxie jixiang de zhenzhu koutou, ruguo nimen shi chongbai ta dehua.
Ruguo tamen zi da, namo, zai ni de zhu nali de zhong tianshen, ze shi zhouye zansong ta, tamen bing buyanjuan de.※

Ni kan dadi shi ganku de, dang wo jiangxia yushui de shihou, ta bian huodong er pengzhang qilai, zhe ta shi ta de jixiang. Neng shi dadi fuhuo zhe, bi neng shi siren fuhuo, ta duiyu wanshi, que shi quanneng de.

Qujie wo de jixiang zhe, bi buneng yinni qilai, bu rang wo kanjian tamen. Shi zai fuhuo ri bei touru huo yu zhe hao ne? Haishi zai fuhuo ri anquan zhe hao ne? Nimen yao zuo shenme, jiu suibian zuo shenme ba! Ta que shi mingcha nimen de xingwei de.
Buxin yi jianglin de jiaohui zhe, wo yao chengfa ta. Na jiaohui que shi jiangu de jingdian,
xuwei buneng cong ta de qianhou jingong ta, ta shi cong zhi rui de, ke song de zhu jiang shi de.
Renmen dui ni shuo de, buguo shi yiwang dui zhong shizhe shuoguo de lanyan, ni de zhu, que shi you she you de, que shi you tong cheng de.

Jiaruo wo jiang shi yi bu waiguoyu de “gulanjing”, tamen biding hui shuo:`Zenme bu jieshi qizhong de jie wen ne? Yi bu waiguoyu de jingdian he yige alabo de xianzhi ma?'Ni shuo:`Ta shi xindao zhe de xiangdao he yaofang; buxindao zhe ting'erbuwen, shi'erbujian, yinwei zhexie ren shi cong yuan chu bei hanjiao de.'
Wo que yi ba tian jing shouyu mu sa, dan zhongren wei neitian jing er fenqi, jiaruo meiyou yiju hua cong ni de zhu yuxian fachu, tamen bi shou caipan. Tamen duiyu ta, que shi zai yilu zhi zhong.
Xingshan zhe zi shou qi yi, zuo'e zhe zi shou qi hai. Ni de zhu jue bu hui kui wang zhong pu de.

Guanyu fuhuo shi de renshi, zhi guiyu ta; guoshi de tuo e, nuxing de huaiyun he fenmian, wu yi buzai ta de dong jian zhong. Zai na ri, ta jiang wen tamen:`Nimen wangcheng wei wo de huoban de, zai nali ne?'Tamen jiang shuo:`Women baogao ni, women zhong jue meiyou yigeren neng zuo zheng zhe jian shi.'
Tamen shengqian suo qidao de, jiang huibi tamen, tamen jiang quexin ziji wu suo tao zui.
Ren qifu bu yan, yi zao huohuan jiu huixin juewang.

Ta zaoyu huannan zhihou, ruguo wo shi ta changshi cong wo jiangxia de enhui, ta biding shuo:`Zhe shi wo yong gongzuo huan lai de. Wo buxin fuhuo shi hui daolai. Ruguo wo bei zhao qu jian wo de zhu, ze wo zai ta nali bi shou zhi shan de baochou.'Wo bi jiang bu xindao zhe de xingwei gaosu tamen, wo bi shi tamen changshi yanzhong de xingfa.
Dang wo shi en yu ren de shihou, ta wang'en er zi da, dang ta zaoyu huohuan de shihou, ta qidao bu jue.
Ni shuo:`Nimen gaosu wo ba! Ruguo “gulanjing” shi cong zhenzhu nali jiang shi de, er nimen bu xin ta, namo, you shui bi changyuan weibei zhenli zhe geng mi wu ne?'
Wo jiang zai sifang he zai tamen zishen zhong, ba wo de xuduo jixiang zhaoshi tamen, zhidao tamen mingbai “gulanjing” que shi zhenli. Nandao ni de zhu neng jianzheng wanwu hai bugou ma?
Zhen de, tamen dique huaiyi jianglai shifou yao yu tamen de zhu huimian. Zhen de, ta que shi zhouzhi wanwu de.
